description: This Python source file sets up an audio transcription tool using MLX Whisper, configuring an agent with specific instructions and dependencies, and includes code to locate audio files and initialize the agent.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools and models.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class for interacting with OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: MLXTranscribeTools
classes.description: Tool class for transcribing audio files using MLX Whisper.

methods.name: Path.parent
methods.description: Returns the parent directory of the path.

methods.description: Joins one or more path components intelligently.

methods.name: Path.mkdir
methods.description: Creates a new directory at this path.

methods.description: Initializes an agent with specified parameters.

methods.name: OpenAIChat

methods.description: Initializes the transcription tools with a base directory.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent, optionally streaming.
